column6: along with local military police forces
column7: cracked down on illegal drug trafficking in Kok Dong village
column11: 11-year-old Roeun Hout (*Khmer news often add a year onto ages
column12: so he is possibly only 10). ------45 packets of crystal meth weighing 30.42 grams were seized as evidence.------With the permission of the prosecutor
column13: the juvenile suspect was escorted to a residential home and sent to the court for processing. ------POST NEWS
